content: the pierrot vest has a simple boxy shape and a fun graphic motif it is a great way to get you started in intarsia as it is a simple project that is fun and easy to knit this pattern is knitted flat from the bottom up in cardo our bulky hand dyed yarn made with 100% corriedale wool the vest is worked back and forth in stockinette stitch front and back are knitted separately following intarsia charts later the two parts are sewn together and the neck and armhole ribs are knitted in the round **final measurements** sizes - 1 2 3 bust circumference - 41 49 56 5 / 104 124 144 **yarn and quantities** *manos del uruguay cardo* 100% corriedale approx 109 yds / 100 mts per 100 g color a pumpkin 1 3 3 skeins color b love potion 1 2 2 skeins color c spirulina 1 1 1 skeins color d concord 1 1 1 skeins color e cirrus 1 2 2 skeins
